title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\Vehicle\LoadLimit
name: LoadLimit
description:
Defines a load limit applying to a vehicle, e.g. "this truck may only carry up to 3500 kg". See [load_limits][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.load_limits].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.LoadLimit

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.soft_max_load
params.description: A soft limit of the load. See [cost_per_unit_above_soft_max][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.LoadLimit.cost_per_unit_above_soft_max].

params.name: data.cost_per_unit_above_soft_max
params.description: If the load ever exceeds [soft_max_load][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.LoadLimit.soft_max_load] along this vehicle's route, the following cost penalty applies (only once per vehicle): (load - [soft_max_load][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.LoadLimit.soft_max_load]) * [cost_per_unit_above_soft_max][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Vehicle.LoadLimit.cost_per_unit_above_soft_max]. All costs add up and must be in the same unit as [Shipment.penalty_cost][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Shipment.penalty_cost].

params.name: data.start_load_interval
params.description: The acceptable load interval of the vehicle at the start of the route.

params.name: data.end_load_interval
params.description: The acceptable load interval of the vehicle at the end of the route.

methods.description:
